institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 20 (Objection Processing Committee)
contents: Article 20 (Objection Processing Committee) ① An Objection Processing Committee is established to handle major objections to the execution and evaluation and scoring results of skill competitions., ② The composition of the Objections Processing Committee is as follows., 1 Chairperson: The head of the division in charge of the objection. However, if the head of a division has an accident, a person designated by the head of the technical committee will act on his behalf, and if the head of the division also serves as the head of the review, the chair of the technical committee will serve as the chairperson. Revised 2019. 4. 9., 2. Ex officio members: Chief judge and deputy judge for the relevant occupation Revised 2018. 2. 22., 3. Among two or more judges who participated in the relevant occupation and other experts in the relevant occupation or skill competition experts A person appointed by the chairman
